caseStudies.name: Discovery World Trekking
caseStudies.title:
A website
that’s not just a website.
caseStudies.description: Last Door did ground research and decided to redo the DWT’s site from scratch to redefine the user interaction and create a seamless travel booking experience. The discovery world trekking site stands as a pioneer website in the Nepalese Travel Industry. Also, DWT saw its all-time high conversion after Last Door's work.

caseStudies.name: Anchor Wave
caseStudies.title: Rock-solid projects, powerful partnership
caseStudies.description: Realize their full potential of having a partner who crafts digital solutions that stand the test of time. We spent the last 17 years helping our partners Strategize, Design, Develop and grow their Brands & Products.

caseStudies.name: Wild Yak Expeditions
caseStudies.title: Super clean website for the wildyak
caseStudies.description: Last Door was approached to refine the design and produce a WordPress site that ensure a rock-solid cms to manage their seamless switching between the multiple languages and content respective to each languages. We put up a chic website that reflected their personality to the website. We also saw a significant improvement in SEO and conversion.

caseStudies.name: Ace the Himalaya
caseStudies.title: Durable cms with conversion oriented UX
caseStudies.description: Complete re-structure and design of the travel company’s existing website. We had lots of strategy level meetings with the client and discussions on the client’s future goals and company directions. We made a major ux refresh restructuring the website on 2017 and it stood strong with higher conversion and smooth operation.

caseStudies.name: Department of Twin Research & Genetic Epidemiology, King's College London
caseStudies.title: Pioneering twin research through digital Innovation
caseStudies.description: Partnering with TwinsUK, we created an advanced web portal dedicated to twin research. This platform serves as a central hub for publishing groundbreaking research findings and facilitates the registration of twins for studies. Our technical expertise and innovative design have enhanced TwinsUK's ability to connect with the twin community.

logo.alt: Department of Twin Research & Genetic Epidemiology, King's College London

image.alt: Department of Twin Research & Genetic Epidemiology, King's College London First Letter

caseStudies.name: Mountain Kick
caseStudies.title: Website as unique as their business
caseStudies.description: We designed and developed the fully responsive website they wanted, making sure it reflected their personality, experience and ambition well. With a mixture of sophistication and simplicity (and a pinch of ‘edgy’), we managed to achieve a vibrant and informative online persona for MountainKick.

caseStudies.name: Nepal Alternative Treks & Expedition
caseStudies.title: Dynamic Site, Vibrant Travel Stories
caseStudies.description: We collaborated with Nepal Alternative Treks to create a visually stunning and user-friendly website that enhances their online presence. The website features Nepal's unique travel experiences and provides travelers worldwide with an immersive online experience.

image.alt: Nepal Alternative Treks & Expedition First Letter
